多层支撑

Multi-layer supporting

返回

首页 < 产业布局 < 多层支撑

商业贸易、物业管理、品牌建设、创新科技 四大业务领域，
是海领产业布局的辅助力量， 与市场和民生两大产业深度融合，为海领发展 提供重要支撑服务。
The four major business areas of commercial trade, property management, brand building, and innovative technology are the supporting forces for the
Hailing industry layout. They are deeply integrated with the market
and the people's livelihood industry and provide important support services for the development of Hailing.

  • 商业贸易

    Commercial trade

  • 物业管理

    Property management

  • 品牌建设

    Brand building

  • 创新科技

    Innovative technology
